com.stefanski.booksearch.bgjobs

Class WebpageDownloaderTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stefanski.booksearch.bgjobs.WebpageDownloaderTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class WebpageDownloaderTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Multithread web page Downloader. With thread-per-task approach (Executor freamowork).
    Author:
    Frederik Stefanski

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WebpageDownloaderTask(boolean downloadAll)
      Get all web links from data store via WebLinksDao if the downloadAll flag is true.
